metadata.title: Thai Princess Bajrakitiyabha, in Hospital Since 2022, Treated for Blood Infection, Palace Says

left: The Thai king's eldest daughter, Princess Bajrakitiyabha Mahidol, has suffered a 'severe' blood infection while unconscious in hospital for over two years due to a heart condition.
The 46-year-old princess, known as Princess Bha, fell ill in December 2022 during a military dog training session.
Doctors are monitoring her condition and providing treatment, while strict laws govern discussions about the Thai royal family.
center: The Thai king's eldest daughter, Princess Bajrakitiyabha Mahidol, has suffered a 'severe' blood infection while unconscious in hospital for over two years due to a heart condition.
The 46-year-old princess, known as Princess Bha, fell ill in December 2022 during a military dog training session.
Doctors are monitoring her condition and providing treatment, while strict laws govern discussions about the Thai royal family.
right: Princess Bajrakitiyabha Mahidol has been unconscious in the hospital since December 2022 after having heart problems during dog training.
The Bureau of the Royal Household reported that she is in a 'severe' state and suffers from a blood infection.
Doctors report she remains in low blood pressure and are providing treatment to stabilize her condition.
King Maha Vajiralongkorn has not officially announced a successor.
